languages.text: "Все мы однажды падем. Солнечный Волк падет, сраженный Моркаи, погаснет свет, и придет Время Волка. Отгремит гром Последней битвы, и не станет ничего. Каждый знает это, но не каждый может поверить и понять это. Я теперь — могу".

"We will all one day fall. The Sun Wolf will fall, vanquished by Morkai; the light will go out; and Wolf Time will come. The storm of the Final Battle will pass and then there will be nothing. All know this, but not all can believe and understand it. I can... now."
languages.original_text: "Все мы однажды падем. Солнечный Волк падет, сраженный Моркаи, погаснет свет, и придет Время Волка. Отгремит гром Последней битвы, и не станет ничего. Каждый знает это, но не каждый может поверить и понять это. Я теперь — могу".

"We will all one day fall. The Sun Wolf will fall, vanquished by Morkai; the light will go out; and Wolf Time will come. The storm of the Final Battle will pass and then there will be nothing. All know this, but not all can believe and understand it. I can... now."

"We will all one day fall. The Sun Wolf will fall, vanquished by Morkai; the light will go out; and Wolf Time will come. The storm of the Final Battle will pass and then there will be nothing. All know this, but not all can believe and understand it. I can... now."

"We will all one day fall. The Sun Wolf will fall, vanquished by Morkai; the light will go out; and Wolf Time will come. The storm of the Final Battle will pass and then there will be nothing. All know this, but not all can believe and understand it. I can... now."

languages.text: «Algún día, caeremos todos. El Lobo Solar caerá, derrotado por Morkai; la luz se extinguirá; llegará la Hora Loba. Llegará la tormenta de la batalla final, tras la cual no puede quedar nada. Todos saben esto, pero no todos pueden creerlo y aceptarlo. Yo puedo... ahora».
languages.original_text: "We will all one day fall. The Sun Wolf will fall, vanquished by Morkai; the light will go out; and Wolf Time will come. The storm of the Final Battle will pass and then there will be nothing. All know this, but not all can believe and understand it. I can... now."

traits.locale_text: «Algún día, caeremos todos. El Lobo Solar caerá, derrotado por Morkai; la luz se extinguirá; llegará la Hora Loba. Llegará la tormenta de la batalla final, tras la cual no puede quedar nada. Todos saben esto, pero no todos pueden creerlo y aceptarlo. Yo puedo... ahora».

languages.text: “终有一天，我们都会陨落。日狼终将陨落，终将被莫凯征服；光明将会熄灭，群狼之刻必将来临。终局之战的风暴将会平息，随后一切都将不复存在。所有人都清楚这一点，但并非所有人都能相信、理解。而我现在……可以理解了。”
languages.original_text: "We will all one day fall. The Sun Wolf will fall, vanquished by Morkai; the light will go out; and Wolf Time will come. The storm of the Final Battle will pass and then there will be nothing. All know this, but not all can believe and understand it. I can... now."

traits.locale_text: “终有一天，我们都会陨落。日狼终将陨落，终将被莫凯征服；光明将会熄灭，群狼之刻必将来临。终局之战的风暴将会平息，随后一切都将不复存在。所有人都清楚这一点，但并非所有人都能相信、理解。而我现在……可以理解了。”

languages.text: 「我々は皆いつか死ぬ。サンウルフはモルカイに敗れ、滅びるだろう。光は消え、ウルフの時代がやってくる。最終決戦の嵐も過ぎ去り、その後にはなにも残らないだろう。これは誰もが知っていることだが、誰もがそれを信じ理解できるわけではない…今の俺には…できるがな」
languages.original_text: "We will all one day fall. The Sun Wolf will fall, vanquished by Morkai; the light will go out; and Wolf Time will come. The storm of the Final Battle will pass and then there will be nothing. All know this, but not all can believe and understand it. I can... now."

traits.locale_text: 「我々は皆いつか死ぬ。サンウルフはモルカイに敗れ、滅びるだろう。光は消え、ウルフの時代がやってくる。最終決戦の嵐も過ぎ去り、その後にはなにも残らないだろう。これは誰もが知っていることだが、誰もがそれを信じ理解できるわけではない…今の俺には…できるがな」

languages.text: « Nous sommes tous appelés à mourir un jour ou l'autre. Le Loup du Soleil tombera sous les coups de Morkaï ; la lumière s'éteindra et l'Heure du Loup adviendra. La tourmente de l'ultime bataille passera, et le néant s'ensuivra. Tout le monde le sait, mais tous ne sont pas capables d'y ajouter foi et de le comprendre. Désormais... j'en fais partie. »
languages.original_text: "We will all one day fall. The Sun Wolf will fall, vanquished by Morkai; the light will go out; and Wolf Time will come. The storm of the Final Battle will pass and then there will be nothing. All know this, but not all can believe and understand it. I can... now."

traits.locale_text: « Nous sommes tous appelés à mourir un jour ou l'autre. Le Loup du Soleil tombera sous les coups de Morkaï ; la lumière s'éteindra et l'Heure du Loup adviendra. La tourmente de l'ultime bataille passera, et le néant s'ensuivra. Tout le monde le sait, mais tous ne sont pas capables d'y ajouter foi et de le comprendre. Désormais... j'en fais partie. »

languages.text: "Wir alle werden eines Tages fallen. Der Sonnenwolf wird fallen, von Morkai besiegt; das Licht wird erlöschen; und die Zeit des Wolfes wird kommen. Der Sturm der letzten Schlacht wird sich legen und dann wird es nichts mehr geben. Alle wissen das, doch nicht alle können es glauben und verstehen. Ich kann es ... inzwischen."
languages.original_text: "We will all one day fall. The Sun Wolf will fall, vanquished by Morkai; the light will go out; and Wolf Time will come. The storm of the Final Battle will pass and then there will be nothing. All know this, but not all can believe and understand it. I can... now."

traits.locale_text: "Wir alle werden eines Tages fallen. Der Sonnenwolf wird fallen, von Morkai besiegt; das Licht wird erlöschen; und die Zeit des Wolfes wird kommen. Der Sturm der letzten Schlacht wird sich legen und dann wird es nichts mehr geben. Alle wissen das, doch nicht alle können es glauben und verstehen. Ich kann es ... inzwischen."

languages.original_text: "We will all one day fall. The Sun Wolf will fall, vanquished by Morkai; the light will go out; and Wolf Time will come. The storm of the Final Battle will pass and then there will be nothing. All know this, but not all can believe and understand it. I can... now."

languages.text: "Hepimiz bir gün toprak olacağız. Güneş Kurdu, Morkai'ın ellerinde sonuna kavuşacak, ışıklar sönecek ve Kurt Zamanı gelip çatacak. Son Savaş'ın fırtınası dinecek, ardından geriye hiçbir şey kalmayacak. Bunu herkes bilir ama inanıp anlayamaz. Ben artık anlıyorum."
languages.original_text: "We will all one day fall. The Sun Wolf will fall, vanquished by Morkai; the light will go out; and Wolf Time will come. The storm of the Final Battle will pass and then there will be nothing. All know this, but not all can believe and understand it. I can... now."

traits.locale_text: "Hepimiz bir gün toprak olacağız. Güneş Kurdu, Morkai'nin ellerinde sonuna kavuşacak, ışıklar sönecek ve Kurt Zamanı gelip çatacak. Son Savaş'ın fırtınası dinecek ve sonra geriye hiçbir şey kalmayacak. Bunu herkes bilir ama herkes inanıp anlayamaz. Ben artık anlıyorum."
